sentences.en: African farmers could effectively control fruit fly damage to citrus fruit, cashew and cocoa crops by using the weaver ant as a method of biological control, according to researchers.
sentences.cn: 科学家说，非洲农民可以使用织叶蚁作为一种生物防治手段，有效控制柑橘类、腰果和可可的果蝇虫害。

sentences.en: Cashew nuts and walnuts are both nuts.
Cashew nuts are rich in carbohydrate.
sentences.cn: 腰果含丰富碳水化合物.

sentences.en: Chop cashew nuts, pine nuts, peanuts and pumpkin seeds. Mix them together.
sentences.cn: 把腰果 、 松仁 、 花生、南瓜子切成碎,混合在一起.

sentences.en: Coat the chicken with flour mixture, then dip in egg mixture and coat with cashew mixture.
sentences.cn: 裹上面粉, 再沾上一层蛋液,最后裹上腰果面包屑.

sentences.en: Do not throw confetti, and Cashew Nut Shell does not litter bags.
sentences.cn: 不乱扔纸屑, 不乱丢果壳和包装袋.

sentences.en: HL series of shoe adhesives, since the hard Furan Resin, cashew oil.
sentences.cn: HL系列鞋用胶粘剂, 自硬呋喃树脂, 腰果油等.

sentences.en: Lightly press with hazelnuts or cashew nuts to flatten the cookies.
sentences.cn: 用榛子或腰果轻轻压平饼干.

sentences.en: Or, how about shelled shrimps with cashew nuts?
sentences.cn: 要么, 腰果虾仁 怎么样 ?

sentences.en: Raw Cashew Nuts and Kernels, Clove, Coal, Charcoal, Cocoa Beans, Coffee Beans, Pepper.
sentences.cn: 采购产品生腰果和仁, 丁香, 煤, 木炭, 可可豆, 咖啡豆, 胡椒.

sentences.en: Seed green bell pepper and tomato . Chop. Wash cashew. Bake until golden brown. Set aside.
sentences.cn: 青椒和番茄洗净去瓢,切块. 腰果洗净后放于焗炉内焗至金黄色, 备用.

sentences.en: Sprinkle the deep - fried shallots, cashew nuts, sultanas and coriander on top.
sentences.cn: 然后撒上炸脆的乾葱头 、 腰果 、 无核提子乾和芫荽.

sentences.en: The fleshy hypocarp, or cashew apple, is processed into jam and dried fruit.
sentences.cn: 肉质的果托，或称腰果，可做果酱和干果。

sentences.en: There were also significant increases in exports of natural products such as fish and cashew nuts.
sentences.cn: 自然产品(如鱼类和腰果)的出口有显著增长.

sentences.en: They liked to eat nuts, such as cashew nuts and walnuts.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢吃坚果, 比如腰果和核桃.牛奶用来给他们的身体提供养分.
